content: I Hope You Have Some Biting Wit For the Standard Democrat and Republican Ineffectiveness that Gave Us Kim Jong Un with Nuclear Arms To Hug With First off, if I was you I would have gone with “Fat Boy vs Little Hands” where the versus could be substituted for meets or against if you like…If I was going to title this one for my taste how about: Skull World: Don J. Kong Eats Korean Unzilla: Fatter Wars Pyongyang: City of Glass But you know what is not funny? It is not humorous at all that American diplomats, foreign policy think tanks, and the past three presidents have completely fouled-up our foreign policy concerning the Korean Peninsula that the ragged Kim Dynasty is still a growing existential threat to the American People and the globe generally…Seriously though, I have been fighting the good fight against Anti-Semiticism on Medium since last week’s Syria airstrikes and I hope you would see fit to help me lampoon these racist jerks below Allan… Funny Enough, But I Really Could Use The ‘Club’s Help Fighting Actual Anti-Semites and Racists on…I know we have had our moments Buckley Club, but currently there is an epidemic of verbal goose-steppers of both the Antifa and Neo-Nazi…medium.com
